title: How to cope with seasonal affective disorder (SAD)
description: It's getting darker and colder, and there's still a pandemic. Oh, and then there's seasonal affective disorder. Here's how to spot it and what you can do. (This episode originally aired in October 2020.)
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
